name: @tippingchain/contracts-interface
description: Public contract interfaces and ABIs for TippingChain with admin role system
author: TippingChain Team

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run manual:build
scripts.manual:build: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc src/types.ts --outDir dist --moduleResolution node --target es2020 && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc src/addresses.ts --outDir dist --moduleResolution node --target es2020 && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc src/index.ts --outDir dist --moduleResolution node --target es2020 --resolveJsonModule --allowSyntheticDefaultImports && cp dist/index.js dist/index.cjs.js && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc src/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist --moduleResolution node --target es2020 --resolveJsonModule --allowSyntheticDefaultImports
